channel.title: [317] Working Compiler For You [317] | Working Compiler To Any Java | 4Beginners
channel.description:
Hey Moparscape. Today Im Here To Help All Of Those Noobs / Beginners [Like Me] To Compile There 317 Without No "Cannot Find Path Specified" Errors. This Compiler If For Any Java You Dont Have To Change The Java Development Kit [JDK] Version To Yours Or Anything Like That. Just Copy And Paste The Following Code Into Your Current Compiler: Please Rep++ If This Helped You. Comment If You Get Any Errors Because I Can Help You With Them. [Ill Try To] [hr] Compiler Code: [code=actionscript]@Echo Off Title -YourServerNameHere --- By BentonScape [Owner Joe] [BentonSoft] if exist "%programfiles%\Java" (call :compile "%programfiles%\Java\") else (goto error) :compile for /D %%x in ("%~1jdk*") do (set p="%%~x\bin\javac.exe") if defined p (%p% -cp . *.java) if defined p (goto end) :error echo You do not have Java installed. Please download it at the site that is about to load. "%programfiles%\Internet Explorer\iexplore.exe" http://java.sun.com/javase/downloads/... :end echo Compiling Finished! - YourServerNameHere pause exit[/code]
Picture Of The Compiler Inside:
[IMG]http://i40.tinypic.com/ws5xm0.jpg[/img]
Thanks I Hope I Helped You. Credits: Me [BentonSoft] [Joe] [BentonScape]

item.title: [317] Working Compiler For You [317] | Working Compiler To Any Java | 4Beginners
item.dc:creator: @ox_random_xi ox random xi
item.description:
@ox_random_xi wrote:

[quote=“Daginith, post:22, topic:439088”][quote author=ox random xi link=topic=541791.msg3971190#msg3971190 date=1334174925]

Hey Moparscape.
Today Im Here To Help All Of Those Noobs / Beginners [Like Me] To Compile There 317 Without No “Cannot Find Path Specified” Errors.
This Compiler If For Any Java You Dont Have To Change The Java Development Kit [JDK] Version To Yours Or Anything Like That.
Just Copy And Paste The Following Code Into Your Current Compiler:
Please Rep++ If This Helped You.
Comment If You Get Any Errors Because I Can Help You With Them. [Ill Try To]
[hr]
Compiler Code:

@Echo Off Title -YourServerNameHere --- By BentonScape [Owner Joe] [BentonSoft] if exist "%programfiles%\Java" (call :compile "%programfiles%\Java\") else (goto error) :compile for /D %%x in ("%~1jdk*") do (set p="%%~x\bin\javac.exe") if defined p (%p% -cp . *.java) if defined p (goto end) :error echo You do not have Java installed. Please download it at the site that is about to load. "%programfiles%\Internet Explorer\iexplore.exe" http://java.sun.com/javase/downloads/... :end echo Compiling Finished! - YourServerNameHere pause exit

Picture Of The Compiler Inside:

Thanks I Hope I Helped You.
Credits:
Me [BentonSoft] [Joe] [BentonScape]

Isn’t yours noob, this is around for ages.
at least you could adjust it so it works for 64bit to, but no you decided to c&p&takecredits

This is mine btw and ill prove it if you want me to… tell me what to name the file as and ill do it and upload new pic you cunt

because, naming a file on your computer is now the clear and only way to prove something is yours.
If I followed that, I can own any program I want then?
[/quote]

Rename System32 to Daginith
I now own Microsoft[/quote]
You just made millions right thur.

Read full topic
item.source: [317] Working Compiler For You [317] | Working Compiler To Any Java | 4Beginners

Ill Ask For Rep++ All I Wish To…

You Know This Works So Stop Hate Commenting Just Because You Dont Need This.

Some People Do!

I Laughed at this.

Why dont ya ask David for rep?
[/quote]haha, where is David when you need him?

Thats good 'ol David for ya.
Locking topics that aren’t too bad, and giving innocent people infractions.
But the threads that need to be locked, he never touches…

Must be loosing his touch with natural instincts of finding actual problems

He has always been that way. Never seen him find a legit problem once. <3
He is too busy Ban Hammering everyone, except the people that should be.

In the words of Deathchaos09 “BAN BAN BAN BAN BAN BAN”

In the words of Mrs Silabsoft
“meh”[/quote]
Lulz. In the words of MITB “Ban…hmmm…wha…GUNS! :)”

This is going way off topic. David is sure to be here any time now.

@Echo Off Title -YourServerNameHere --- By BentonScape [Owner Joe] [BentonSoft] if exist "%programfiles%\Java" (call :compile "%programfiles%\Java\") else (goto error) :compile for /D %%x in ("%~1jdk*") do (set p="%%~x\bin\javac.exe") if defined p (%p% -cp . *.java) if defined p (goto end) :error echo You do not have Java installed. item.dc:creator: @Skiire Skiire
item.description:
@Skiire wrote:

Why is this posted within the server help? Server snippets would be the only reasonable place to post this… But in my opinion if you can’t set up your own environmental variables without trouble you really shouldn’t even be considering programming, even in the most simplistic of languages.

Also, no offence, but this isn’t really worthy of any rep people really need to stop relying on MS-DOS commands too and this just keeps them coming back for more.

Read full topic
